overview: Taino is a passionate young student who lives in Nassau, Bahamas. He's a dreamer often with his head in the clouds. His only real friend, with whom he shares everything is Elina, a bubbly, outspoken islander whose mantra in life is to be present in all moments. But Taino has a heavy secret even Elina doesn't know until now. With hands trembling and sweat pouring, Taino reveals who (or what) he really is.
title: The Golden Record
